thread.title: Total Doubles Down on Arctic LNG

author: Sarah Kent
title: Total Doubles Down on Arctic LNG
text:
LONDON—French oil giant Total SA signed a deal Thursday to take a 10% stake in a massive Russian gas project, doubling down on efforts to ship supercooled natural gas from the country’s Arctic peninsula.
The move builds on Total’s position in the region, giving it a large stake in a project that is expected to eventually produce 535,000 barrels of oil equivalent a day.
